question: What is the place value of 1 in the number 1,566,894?
Ryan wants to write the digit 6 of the number 147.630 differently. Help him write correctly.
Lara gets a passcode with the number 6310.185. Her friend asked her what the digit was at the hundredth place.
How do we write 12,002,023.23 in words?
options: Ten million, two thousand, twenty-three and twenty-three
Twelve million, two thousand, twenty-three and twenty-three hundredths
One million, two hundred, twenty-three and twenty-three hundredths
One million, twenty hundred, twenty-three and twenty-three
